page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: The industrial estate in this area has a good location because it is on the{B1277}quite near the{A689}Stockton Road,which leads onto the{A19.}It is also near the main coastal railway. The industrial estate deals in different products for example Camerons deal in soft drinks which are sold in shops.This is a light industry.There is also a steelworks which is heavy industry and service industry in the form of a demolition industry. This industrial estate is fairly modern and it is made more attractive by planting trees in grass over waste areas.There is lots of waste land for expanding factories and to make larger car parks.All of the factory buildings are constructed of concrete and corrugated iron and have flat roofs.
